original_text: Mordecai was prominent in the palace; his reputation spread throughout the provinces, and he became more and more powerful.
korean_text: 모르드개가 왕궁에서 존귀하여 점점 창대하매 이 사람 모르드개의 명성이 각 지방에 퍼지더라

sentences.original_text: Mordecai was prominent in the palace
his reputation spread throughout the provinces
and he became more and more powerful
